snippet: Responding on Friday to the completion of a highly critical Senate report on the C.I.A.’s former interrogation program, the agency’s acting director expressed support for its work force.
abstract: Central Intelligence Agency's acting director Michael J Morell, responding to highly critical Senate report on agency's former interrogation program, expresses support for agency's work force.
lead_paragraph: Responding on Friday to the completion of a highly critical Senate report on the C.I.A.’s former interrogation program, the agency’s acting director expressed support for its work force.

headline.main: C.I.A. Director Reacts to Report Critical of Detainee Interrogations
headline.print_headline: C.I.A. Director Reacts To Report Critical of Detainee Interrogations
